articles.title: Monkeypox vaccine: Who will get it first? From effectiveness to doses, WHO chief answers everything | Mint - Mint
articles.description: One smallpox vaccine, called MVA-BN, has been approved in Canada, the European Union and the US .Two other vaccines, LC16 and ACAM2000, are also being considered for use against monkeypox
